story: As an Admins, I want to reset passwords, so that users can regain access.
As Users. Want to export data.
As a Manager, I review reports, they are approved by Finance.
As a Nurse, I review lab results and notifies physicians when values are critical.
As a Reader, I want to save articles, so that I can find them later (at any time.
As a Customer, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access to my account.
As Admins, we need to review flagged posts.
To reduce errors, operators verify each batch before shipping.
